name: Ctrl-Q
description:
Ctrl-Q

Lead Byte through a series of platforms, aided by your sassy sidekick, Flippy. 

Controls: 

A/D - Left/Right
E - Advance Dialogue
Space - Jump
Ctrl - Z : Reset Level
Ctrl - X : Cut (Create teleport point)
Ctrl - C : Copy yourself
Ctrl - V : Paste (Teleport back to point created with x)

If you have any issues with the Web version, Please download the Windows Executable.
